definition: (prefix indicating ordinal number, e.g. first, number two etc)/order/(old) rank in the imperial examinations/mansion/(literary) but/just

sentences.english: When two 3rd tones are in succession, the first 3rd tone is pronounced as a 2nd tone.
sentences.chinese: 兩個第三聲連在一起時，前一個讀成第二聲。

sentences.english: The third tone is a long low tone plus a short rising tone.
sentences.chinese: 第三聲由長降調和短升調組成。
